lines.text: Maybe... one of those candles wasn't a candle.
Huh? What else would it be?
A voodoo effigy of Slick! So it got shot, and Slick died!
And then they melted the effigy to hide the evidence! With the fire! It all makes sense!
Be honest with me: is that a thing they could do?
Uh... well, they can't do any magic outside their class...
And even if they could, they'd need time to prepare an effigy for Slick...
